column4: hi everyone, i've just upgraded gutsy -> hardy and as is typical with these things my entire X config has gone to pot. I was about to try and reconfigure my dual screen nvidia setup again and i was wondering if i can now do  this through a setup screen? rather than all the xorg.conf tweaking that's been needed in the past
i'll keep tweaking thanks
are there any plans for dual head support in actual menus?
it really puts ubuntu behind gaydows
please dont use that a derogatory term thanks
please pastebin the out put of lspci
you tried the madwifi with that? it say s in ubuntu 5006, but in fact may be the 5007-->this is a dual boot?
no idea what that is
what does ifconfig show
does ifconfig show three entries or two
you still around?
three but i have two onboard wired ports as well
so no ath0?
sorry i've just got a dvorak keyboard so my typing speed is gash - there is no ath0
I believe yo need to install the linux-restricted-modules appropriate to you r kernel to get madwifi drivers for that card
thx will try
try the live cd first
Otherwise no major reported problems?
certainly some; just need to check if they apply to you
Is the best image for me to download the one from cdimage.ubuntu.com - or the one from the website do you reckon?
either one or the torrent will work fine
